summary: A change to the unique dialogue TLD has with Faralda
descriptionHtml:
Usually after you open the Time Wound, TLD gets a new dialogue with Faralda at the bridge leading up to the College of Winterhold if they haven't already joined the College. When she tests you on your magical abilities, you can say "I'm the Dragonborn", and she'll let you pass. That dialogue is now unlocked much earlier, as soon as "Way of the Voice" is completed.

INSTALLATION
This is really simple. Just drag and drop as with most other .esp files.
author: Kestatwala and Parzaelan
